waterquality: Satellite Derived Water Quality Detection Algorithms

Source: R/waterquality-package.R
waterquality-package.Rd

The goal of 'waterquality' is to convert satellite-reflectance imagery to a host of pre-defined water quality algorithms designed for the detection of chlorophyll-a, blue-green algae (Phycocyanin), and turbidity (Beck et al. (2017) <doi:10.3390/rs9060538>). This package is able to process the following sensor configurations: WorldView-2, Sentinel-2, Landsat-8, MODIS, and MERIS.

See also
